job.title: AWS DevOps Scalability and Security
job.description:
We are looking to hire an AWS DevOps expert to help us with the Architecture of our systems. We have a large recipe database and API that we use to support our mobile app. Our system is hosted in S3 buckets with some Lambda functionality. Our top contenders will receive a document will more in depth details of our initial needs.

Applicants should have some level of knowledge of the .net framework

Please provide:
-Past projects you're proud of and feel give you a leg up
-Your favorite color
-Any recommendations you feel would be important for us to know about

We will be bidding the initial build for total cost. The winner will have the option to join our team for DevOps maintenance and future work

questions.question: Please list any certifications related to this project
How do you operationalize your projects?

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a skilled AWS DevOps expert who specializes in scalability and security. The project is expected to last for 1 to 3 months. The ideal candidate should possess in-depth knowledge of Amazon Web Services, DevOps practices, and Docker.

As a candidate, we would like you to submit a detailed proposal outlining how you can contribute to this project. Specifically, we need you to describe your expertise and how you can help us achieve our scalability and security goals within the AWS environment. Please also provide links to any relevant past projects you have completed that showcase your proficiency in this area.

We are excited to collaborate with an experienced professional who can ensure the smooth operation and security of our AWS infrastructure.
